dateline.placeName: Adelphi Hotel, LiverpoolCD was in Liverpool on his Farewell Series of readings.

body.p: I shall not be in London until Monday the 12th. at 12 at “All The Year Round office.”In a brief return to London: he read in London on 13 April and then went on to Bradford. But I shall be [ ]Word deleted by CD.here all this next week, and will execute the deedsUnidentified. Possibly related to arrangements for Ellen Ternan; also possibly related to property referred to in CD’s Will as “vested in me as a trustee or mortagee” (Pilgrim Letters 12, p. 731). and add my Secretary’sGeorge Dolby. He was with CD on this Farewell Series; CD referred to him as both “my manager” and “my Secretary” (Pilgrim Letters 12, pp. 199, 336). attestation, if you deem it worth while to send them down for that purpose.
